topics.description: Comma-separated list of topics to produce to

connect.servicebus.kcql.description: KCQL expression describing field selection and data routing to the target.
connect.servicebus.kcql.title: connect.servicebus.kcql

connect.servicebus.source.prefetch.count.title: connect.servicebus.source.prefetch.count

connect.servicebus.source.complete.retri.description: The maximum number of retries to complete a message.
connect.servicebus.source.complete.retri.title: connect.servicebus.source.complete.retries.max

connect.servicebus.source.complete.retri.description: The minimum duration in milliseconds for the first backoff
connect.servicebus.source.complete.retri.title: connect.servicebus.source.complete.retries.min.backoff.ms

connect.servicebus.source.sleep.on.empty.description: The duration in milliseconds to sleep when no records are returned from the poll. This avoids a tight loop in Connect.
connect.servicebus.source.sleep.on.empty.title: connect.servicebus.source.sleep.on.empty.poll.ms
